sn35.61:4.4: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
sn35.61:4.7: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rūpesupi nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati.
sn35.61:4.10: vimokkhā ‘pariyādinnaṃ me upādānan’ti pajānāti … pe …
sn35.61:4.11: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṃ … pe …
sn35.61:4.12: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ.
sn35.61:4.15: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manoviññāṇepi nibbindati manosamphassepi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati.
